website_summaries.verdict: This chocolate-flavored powder delivers superfood energy from organic grains, seeds, legumes, greens and juices, with 20g protein per serving.
cons: Some people dislike the strong taste and texture this powder gives to smoothies

customer_reviews.title: Why is the canister so overpriced when the packets are so much cheaper?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I use it in my morning smoothie everyday! I always buy 2 of the 10ct because why would you pay ~$34 for 20 servings when you can pay ~$24 for 20 servings...?
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Contains Trytophan which for some may have adverse effects
customer_reviews.text: I loved pretty much everything about it - the ingredients, nutritional content, taste - however after about a week of having consumed it I developed severe fatigue and strange aches throughout my body. Upon further research one of the ingredients have been linked to eosinophilia-myalgia syndrome (EMS) which include the symptoms I mentioned. This may not affect everyone but for those with more sensitive symptoms, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a vegetarian who tries to get extra protein where I can, and this powder is perfectly made, and tastes great. I'm also a brain cancer survivor, and need to keep the bod alkaline, so the greens help with that, also. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the recommendation of a friend. I had been drinking Herbalife products but I wanted something more natural and without sucralose. Thank goodness for the return policy. This was the most disgusting thing I have ever tasted. I blended it with ice and water. I nearly threw up on the first taste. It was like drinking peas and kale with a hint of unsweetened bakers chocolate. It blended terribly with ice, it was all separated and nasty. If you want to lose weight this is probably a great option because you will completely lose your appetite after one sip.
customer_reviews.author: J. Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: The new formula is absolutely disgusting. I didn't realize they changed it when I ...
customer_reviews.text: The new formula is absolutely disgusting.I didn't realize they changed it when I placed my order but I will not be buying this again which is unfortunate because I really liked the old formula.After drinking this for the first time yesterday my whole digestive track was unhappy for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Gaede

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. I get the vanilla and mix it in with a bunch of veggies & some fruit in blender and it really adds to the taste. I ran out of it this week and realized that my juices (smoothies) suddenly tasted like grass. It really does taste good and help balance out all the strong veggie flavors. Such a great product with all that it includes and it got the thumbs up from my nutritionist.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McNichol

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition. AWFUL taste.
customer_reviews.text: You know how they say "if it tastes good it must be bad for you"? This must be the healthiest powder out there. It tastes like dehydrated grass and dirt. Can't argue with the ingredients/nutrition though. I dont like eating vegetables and try to eat lots of protein/less sugar so this product met most of my needs. Too bad it tastes like chalky sod.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Beach in a cup!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews, but as someone that spends hours on amazon looking for the best products with the best deals and thought this was it, I needed to say something. This was unbelievably awful. I was so excited to drink it for breakfast this morning and I couldn’t. It was soooooooo gritty. It’s like I went outside, got a scoop of sand, and dumped it in there. I tried making it in a smoothie AND a blender bottle, both awful. Go spend money on a different product bc if you are like me and really needed more protein plus the greens so it’ll improve your digestion, this will not work bc you can’t even get it down.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Timoney

customer_reviews.title: I CANNOT BELIEVE HOW GOOD THIS TASTES!
customer_reviews.text: I CANNOT BELIEVE HOW GOOD IT TASTES! It dissolves easily, no weird texture, no weird aftertaste. My husband even liked it, and he hates broccoli, spinach, and pretty much everything that’s healthy. (Joking, but you get the idea.) I mixed mine with rice milk, and it looked and tasted just like plain ole chocolate milk. THE BEST CHOCOLATE FIX EVER!!! -Vegan -Organic -20 grams of protein -Less than 1 gram of sugar -6 veggies and superfoods And SOOOOO GOOD!!! I haven’t been this excited about a health food product in my entire life!!! Hahaha Thanks, Garden of Life for making me sound like a walking commercial!
customer_reviews.author: Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, Energizing, Healthy = Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Great quality product, and given the saturation of veggies and seeds it is made with, it tastes pretty darn good. If you are like me and don't enjoy the taste of Stevia, opt for the Lightly Sweet. However, after a bottle of chocolate and vanilla, all three are great and I've adapted to the Stevia flavor. I'm a big, active guy (6'6"). I'm amazed how sustained my energy is with this in my morning smoothie. Most days this is all I need until lunch, which blows my mind given the calories in one serving. I personally mix it up with some hemp seeds, chia seeds and frozen cherries and or bananas. Well done GOL!
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a medicine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vanilla one. But couldn't stand the flavor. Tastes like medicine - very intense. Don't know any other things about this. The product may be ok for those who may like the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Californian

customer_reviews.title: Mild taste
customer_reviews.text: I use protein to supplement my post workouts and to make sure I get enough for the day. After spending a lot on proteins and greens separately, I decided to try this. I think the taste is actually really mild, I mix about 6 oz of water, 2 oz of milk and 1 scoop. This has made my digestive system work amazingly! Also, I always feel full and satisfied after drinking. Will continue with this product !
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy it again. Too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: I won't buy it again. Too expensive for what you get. The product in the container is not what it is supposed to be. The container came almost empty. I didn't return it because it was a present for my wife on Mother's Day, and she opened it already.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Valecillos

customer_reviews.title: I love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder! Unfortunately the lass two that I have ordered have tasted way different and very stale. I'll return both :/ and probably hit in the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chalky and powdery feeling left in mouth
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is ok. I just can't get over how grainy and chalky the texture is after you mix it up. It does not mix well with any liquid to have a smooth outcome. I was hoping this would be the one because the nutritional value is what I want but powdery feeling it leaves in your mouth is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: gadunn

customer_reviews.title: Good product/ misleading packaging
customer_reviews.text: The protein is great but my package came half empty?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Intermittently i deal with gastroparesis, and liquids are pretty much the only thing my body even comes close to digesting. I love garden of life chocolate protein powder! I mix it with flaxseed or coconut milk, frozen bananas, add brain octane liquid and aloe vera juice. It tastes great and nourishes me.
customer_reviews.author: KathyF

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for travel and they were great!! For times I didn’t have food or was on a flight I put one packet into a tumbler with water and shook it up. It tasted great! Not overly sweet like some proteins and I did not even need to add anything. (I like the chocolate flavor). I also really appreciate the quality and ingredient profile. And they are a B certified company, I appreciate that! Just purchased again for another travel trip.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn McMurtrie

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without it
customer_reviews.text: this product saves my knees. I have arthritis and when I don't drink the shake for more than 5 days, my knees let me know. I rarely eat meat so this is my protein. Tastes great, good consistency, been drinking this for about 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: hippiekit

customer_reviews.title: Just kind of meh
customer_reviews.text: I love that this powder has greens added in the product. Unfortunately, it does not blend very well and is quite gritty even after super blending. The flavor isn’t bad, but I wouldn’t say it’s tasty either. Just kinda meh.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee

customer_reviews.title: Old product I mean very old product
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy from this company again. Got the product and spend about 15 minutes opening it as something had gotten damp then dried so a ream of black was under the base of the seal and it stunk to high heaven. I'll save time and money by buying local in town vs having something like this happen again
customer_reviews.author: robert wayne saunders

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lightly sweet flavor: 4 stars 'cause it smells and tastes great. The one thing that's not great as pointed out, is the chalky texture; couldn't seem to get it all mixed in. 2nd (also already pointed out) it's only half full; if the container was just a bit smaller the company would save on plastic and the customer would have more room in the cupboard for their other 'potions and elixirs'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and quality
customer_reviews.text: Super yummy and filling, and it blends well! . I usually blend with a cup of water, frozen banana, handful of spinach, and ice! This makes a perfect after workout drink, or even used as a light lunch! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so won't kill her like other plant protein formulas
customer_reviews.text: Been giving this to an ailing 2 yr old ewe (yes, 250 lb. sheep) I am rehabbing who can't currently forage for herself. ( I'm trying to save her genes for the flock) It has no (obvious) copper, and has sprouted veges, so won't kill her like other plant protein formulas. I am very thankful for this and like the ingredients. (Don't know if I can use it as I have not done well with Stevia...wish there was an unsweetened version so I could add my own sweetener in smoothies.)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how small this container is. I don't think it is a good value for the money. I just use the meal replacement from Garden of Life and add my own greens powder.
customer_reviews.author: Caralucy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Taste and Fails to Mix Well
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this product and now I’m surprised at all the positive reviews. The taste is almost bearable. Almost. However, it’s really difficult to mix into water without a blender. It’s completely clumpy if you attempt to mix it into soy milk. I’m switching back to my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: VeggieRunners

customer_reviews.title: Love love love LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love love love LOVE this stuff!! We buy it all the time as a breakfast supplement. Tastes great! Not super sweet, with that fake sweetener taste, like some other products I've tried. Lasts us a pretty long time. I mix banana and peanut butter, along with some ice in my blender and it's the perfect breakfast on the go. I sometimes add chia seeds and cocoa nibs to give more texture. Overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting this product about every 45 days for a few years now. I get the lightly sweetened and use unsweetened vanilla almond milk and add a starbucks carmel latte packet with a banana or frozen rasberries.  It tastes similar to a Starbucks Frapp. The powder blends well and is consistently good.
customer_reviews.author: ady

customer_reviews.title: It tastes good, mixes well enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as I had been using the same protein supplement for quite some time and wanted to give my body something a little different. It tastes good, mixes well enough, and is satisfying. The powder is very fine and can be a little messier than some if you're not careful, but I don't care. I'm just mentioning that because it was something I noticed compared to other powders. I drink it as a recovery drink after Crossfit and am happy with the results/effects.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life are great products!
customer_reviews.text: I believe in this company and have used their products for years! I am blood type A so I have low stomach acid, but this product is raw so my body is able to assimmulate easier as raw food has more enzymes. The more raw you can eat; the more vitamins you get in cooking you loose vitamins. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jean Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Have tried 2 other brands this one is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Tried Orgain & Vega brands. Both were OK but Garden of Life has great ingredients with the lowest sugar, carb, and calories of the all the other brands we tried. Mixes well and has good flavor. We mix with unsweetened almond milk and frozen fruit. Works well as a meal replacement. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Bark

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting this protein powder for years now and it is awesome! I love the taste and I like the fact that it is very low on carbs and all the proteins are plant based. I make a vegetable smoothie in my vita-mix and put the protein powder in here and I love the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Saiyam Vora

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix and Vanilla forward flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased the powder blended with a simple shack of the water and powder mix and didn't require a blending. Vanilla flavor was great and the most notable flavor ... not the green stuff I want to get in my body but might not necessarily want as the most known flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: We switched from Vega Protein and Greens after reading an article reviewing vegan protein powders on a blog. This tastes so much better and doesn't have the same chemical taste the Vega powders do. We use this exclusively for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Guli

customer_reviews.title: Gross Taste
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of a protein drink with greens and have been giving it a chance. I thought it might help me lose the 4-5 pounds of weight I often need to lose these days. BUT, it tastes like sweetened chalk and is impossible to blend unless put in a blender, unless you like lumpy sweetened chalk. It is going to be my breakfast until the 4 pounds are gone, so I hope I get used to it, will certainly never reorder.
customer_reviews.author: kyaneo

customer_reviews.title: Very goid
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use more for cooking than a drink to add extra vitamins and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Brwhwo

customer_reviews.title: Have liked this powder quite a bit ... but now very expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the vanilla flavored version and have really enjoyed it. The vanilla taste is mild, not too strong, and blends well with my standard breakfast of greek yogurt. I've really enjoyed it, but will be moving on to other options now that I see the cost for reorder -- has gone up to $33, from the $21 I paid just 7 months ago! It's a good product, but at this price it's time to start looking at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Vickizig

customer_reviews.title: Power up my Green Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder in my green smoothies. It helps to keep me fuller in between shakes when I'm detoxing. I honestly don't taste it so I can't speak to flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: great brand, great flavor
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite brand for anything health or supplement related. the chocolate and the vanilla flavors are both good. we have had in peanut butter oatmeal smoothies, with just almond or oat milk, and with JUST water. i prefer just with water!very great taste and texture, and even better ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lbrown

customer_reviews.title: great protein product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a combination greens and protein. Recommended by a nutritionist
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: ... the hunt for a vegan protein that is the perfect fit, and this one just isn't it
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the hunt for a vegan protein that is the perfect fit, and this one just isn't it. The taste isn't super noticeable in smoothies, but it completely messes up the texture and it is almost like you're drinking sand. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great and it’s perfect for my post workout meal. My husband loves it too. The greens in it are key because we are on the run all the time and it gives us all we need. Bless it up with some bp2, 1/2 a banana, and almond milk and it’s delicious
customer_reviews.author: becca shaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protein Shake. Best I Have Ever Tried.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have tried many protein powder drinks because I am vegetarian and need extra protein. This drink literally makes me feel good within an hour after having it! It is a godsend for me. I cannot recommend it highly enough. Taste is just okay with water, I suggest using coconut or almond milk: it is delicious when mixed with chocolate almond milk! Enjoy and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Counsel

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein and nutrients
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this specific protein and I do really enjoy it. It keeps me full and I usually blend it with a little extra spinach and fruit and almond milk which makes it extra tasty. I haven’t tried it without any of those added foods but regardless, it is an excellent source of protein and adds a significant amount of nutrients to your diet that a lot may not usually get. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: This product has an interesting taste. I feel full and satisfied after drinking this mixed with 1-1.5 cups of cashew milk. I used chocolate to cover the strange taste of the powder. Despite shaking it for several minutes, the texture is a bit odd.
customer_reviews.author: BELL

customer_reviews.title: Taste hirrible
customer_reviews.text: Chalky and gross. I really really tried to like thus but I can't stomach it any more. I have chocolate and vanilla. Both are equally gross. I went back to my fitmiss
customer_reviews.author: Cupcakes

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Since cutting out dairy milk a few years back, we’ve been searching for a good tasting chocolate protein powder that didn’t contain dairy. THIS IS IT. After trying several, I can say that this tastes SO similar to what we’re used to with the whey protein. It’s absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, it helps me get good nutrients and has made a real difference in the way I feel. I drink it daily, and also use their meal replacement powder as part of my weight loss program..
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is that this is amazing!! Tastes good- I add fresh fruit, ground chia, and ground flax to my smoothie- easy on stomach too!!
customer_reviews.author: Hetal Naik

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a little gritty, but tastes good other than that. Packaging makes it easy to take for lunch, post workout or a snack if there is a beverage vendor at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement and nutrient The flavor tastes kinda like alfalfa that is given to horses. But you can tell it is organic and full of needed nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Patrik

customer_reviews.title: My go-to smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of Life products, as I know I can count on them having high quality ingredients without all the nasty chemicals. I drink this almost every morning, nice and quick breakfast that I can drink in the car. Even on the weekend, when I am home and have time to cook breakfast, I still find myself making this.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste, would NOT recommend. Not able to even describe the taste, other than to say it tastes like chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pumping Iron
customer_reviews.text: Tastes delicious when mixed with vanilla almond milk. The best activities for your health are pumping and humping and this protein is great after either activity.
customer_reviews.author: PeeblyWeebly

customer_reviews.title: Container was not full
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy and will stop ordering this from this site as the contents were a third of the usual amount. I should have returned it but started using it thinking it must have settled in shipping now it is only lasting me a short time and I'm upset. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sage girl

customer_reviews.title: I have no interest in buying that product again I prefer to get something else.
customer_reviews.text: The protein and green, taste nasty. No matter how long I blend it, I could still taste The residue in my mouth and it also leave an aftertaste in my mouth where I cannot get rid of the taste. And only flavor that I saw was chocolate it was no other flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: It's an acquired taste not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Dont like the taste of artificial sweeteners. It's better with almond milk and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like using a scoop of this in my raw vegetable juice that I prepare from my fresh garden vegetables daily. It is a bit "gritty" But it doesn't bother me at all. I've found it tasted much better when I put a heaping spoonful of peanut butter in with everything else. Good quality. This is a brand I will always stand by. I purchased this at full price and have NOT been compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!!!!!! But Not a fan of Vanilla Flavor
customer_reviews.text: High quality. After lots of research I decided on this. Love it except not a fan of vanilla. Ill try chocolate next time. Other than the flavor, love the energy and positive effect on my waist line
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicee
customer_reviews.text: I love the vanilla flavor of raw protein and greens, have been using for a couple of years now so it has become a go-to. I tried the chocolate raw protein & greens but it's too gritty for my liking. The vanilla has a mildly sweet taste which I like, perfect for mixing with other things like "proatmeal" & smoothies. If you're looking for something bursting with more flavor I would look elsewhere. However, I definitely recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this !!! Add a spoonful of sugar free pudding mix to make it delicious and thick
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As a physically active vegetarian I need bioavailable protein and this product delivers. It's a great way to start the day nourishing myself without loading my system before my yoga practice. It tastes great so its not necessary to add anything else if I'm in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Catano

customer_reviews.title: No full container
customer_reviews.text: Container have empty. Not what I expected for monies paid. It’s cheaper to purchase it at local dty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No artificial sweetener or stevia
customer_reviews.text: A good protien mix without artificial sweeteners or stevia, very difficult to find. Great for travel or on the go. I use only 1/2 pac and mix with 3 oz of greek yougart, almond milk and 1/2 banana, frozen strawberry , makes a very creamy smoothly with the help of vitamix also good if you add peanut butter. If you do not mix with banana or yougart may be gritty.
customer_reviews.author: twishlist

customer_reviews.title: Taste is tolerable
customer_reviews.text: I’m the type of person who HATES the taste of any sort of protein mix but this one I can actually have and some what enjoy! Not to mention all the amazing benefits this shake contains. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a meal replacer or even after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, especially when combined with one of Orgain's protein mixes. Definitely needs to be blended. I use the Nutribullet and it works perfectly. Itdidn't quite last a month, though. I have bee pleased with all of the Garden of Life products, though they are a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: Not good anymore
customer_reviews.text: Was very good but something changed because it tasted and looked different.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It taste great but it is hard to mix
customer_reviews.text: Mixes just ok in water, anything else (oat milk, Hemp Milk, Almond Milk etc is not so good), Other than that I think it is pretty good and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 13FerdST

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting and high quality product. Easy portion pouches are very convenient. Great amount for the price. Has less pea protein than other high quality protein shake powders, which we were looking for specifically. Love the product. Has a little bit of a grassy flavor, but didn't overpower.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a bit sandy if you are drinking ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a bit sandy if you are drinking it with milk and no other additives like fruit. Easy to digest. I have a sensitive stomach and some powders can upset it, however, this goes down with ease. I found it cheaper at all star health.
customer_reviews.author: LJay

customer_reviews.title: Taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I normally like garden of life products but this powder taste tastes horrible. I have tried it many different ways and I can get with it. Don't let the ratings fool you.
customer_reviews.author: Ebby

customer_reviews.title: I Will Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste. Far too grainy/gritty Even when left to sit, it is not better. Tried both hot water and milk; neither produced a drinkable product. I have tried many similar products and this is one of the worse.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Rising

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shake!
customer_reviews.text: tastes great! Gives me a lot of energy in the morning! My naturopath recommended this shake to me to get my 20g of protein every morning. I use this as a meal replacement, and it's pretty filling without any fillers! I breastfeed, so keeping me full is a challenge too! Great quality ingredients, tastes awesome, overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SAM1248

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and has the nutrients I wanted. I have it blended at breakfast with coconut water and 1/2 a cup of frozen fruit and stay full until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: ... protein powders without too many carbs that actually tastes good. It satisfies hunger to a good extent if ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the clean organic protein powders without too many carbs that actually tastes good. It satisfies hunger to a good extent if you can't have a real meal. My body seems to get a small boost with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegan Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Great complex of vegan proteins. I’ve been using this for years and find it to be the highest quality over any of its competitors who have had quality control issues multiple times in the past.
customer_reviews.author: run2088

customer_reviews.title: Quality was outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this product wasn't a five-star all around is because it only really blends well in water first person and I thought it was a little bit overly sweet. Otherwise, thought the quality was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love all garden for life. I’ve been using this protein for about 6 years. The first few months I remember it tasting weird; you just have to adjust your pallet. So delicious, so clean. I crave the taste, and my body feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Needs fiber to be a complete meal. A little grainy. Flavor isn’t bad but isn’t good either.
customer_reviews.author: SiberCats

customer_reviews.title: This has become one of my new favorite protein powders
customer_reviews.text: This has become one of my new favorite protein powders. I bought this on a steep sale once as it was part of the deal of the day. I like that this is 20g of clean raw protein with greens and has only 100 calories per serving. The taste is....ok...not the greatest....but that is with all GOL powders. The way I feel however is great.
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Best protein powder I have ever found. Good, light flavor. Easy on the stomach, unlike so many other proteins. Sometimes if I want to stretch out a container I add some straight organic pea protein powder. HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kati M.

customer_reviews.title: Not much product.
customer_reviews.text: Well I was very surprised by this and get a container half full of product. I think the general public would be happier with a smaller container that looked like it was full. Kind a like a high-end restaurant that puts 2 tablespoons of wine in your glass. So everyone, I just wondered if this was the norm.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: This product is delicious in my morning shake. I mix 6/7 frozen strawberries, scoop of frozen blueberries, banana with apple juice and it’s yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Figueredo

customer_reviews.title: With "Greens"???  Surprising DELICIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was EXTREMELY hesitate to try a vegan protein shake with "greens" but it was surprisingly delicious! Especially with almond milk. It's my afternoon snack and hits my sweet tooth. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is good for you and tastes great too. I used to fast in the mornings and now I have this with some water or almond milk and it gets everything going in the morning. I like it a lot and will be subscribing.
customer_reviews.author: Skysg

customer_reviews.title: Will Purchase Again!
customer_reviews.text: Im a big time protein powder user for many years. This powder is great across the board for me. I found the powder does not need any sweetener as its on the sweeter side. Think next order will be the less sweet version.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Ritch

customer_reviews.title: The container is halfway empty...
customer_reviews.text: I opened the powder this morning after receiving it yesterday, but the container is less than halfway full. Just know when purchasing that the packaging does not meet the expectation of the volume of the product inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Drink this every morning. I mix it with PB2, almond milk and ice. My stomach is not bloated after drinking and does not taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tcsunflower

customer_reviews.title: tastes better, and is vegan which I prefer
customer_reviews.text: Female, in my 30s. Switched off whey because it was making me fat. This stuff doesn’t puff me up, tastes better, and is vegan which I prefer. Drink it every morning with a banana and almond butter mixed in!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I can’t handle the taste. The Trying to find things to mix it in but not having much luck. I heard the chocolate flavor is better.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Culbreth

customer_reviews.title: Not the best not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Tastes pretty good. Thankfully doesn’t have that nasty stevia aftertaste. A little gritty but not horrible, keeps me full all day. I drink two while working a 9 hour shift.
customer_reviews.author: anney

customer_reviews.title: Great new product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in the vanilla flavor: it's less grainy than the original raw protein, it's got great macros, probiotics, added greens, what more do you need? Only qualm is I wish the unflavored version was completely unsweetened (it uses sugar instead of stevia) other than that though, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it!!
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest flavor if you just wanted to mix it with a nut milk and drink like that but for smoothies it's great. I drink mine with my morning matcha smoothie for a quick on the go breakfast that's packed with proteins and caffeine. Can't live without it!! I'm not really big on eating breakfast so I tend to drink mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Drink with more water than suggested
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever protein powder, it took a lot of getting used to. The first time I gagged it down, but I was determined to finish the box. I started using more and more water and I find that it makes it really easy to drink. I like the nutrients it provides so I will continue to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Chalky feel
customer_reviews.text: I've tried mixing this with almond milk, regular milk, added yogurt, fresh and frozen fruit, but I just can't get beyond the "chalky" feel and taste.
customer_reviews.author: RoGard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Dissolve!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this protein powder but it's entirely too clumpy. It doesn't dissolve in anything and so you can't really use it as a supplement. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chalky Taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients on this product but no matter what I add to the smoothie, I can not get rid of the chalkiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to love the ingredients - for me - a much better ...
customer_reviews.text: often pea and/or rice protein is 'chalky' - this is the least chalky I have found - and I just use a shaker bottle - not a blender. You have to love the ingredients - for me - a much better alternative to whey protein derived form dairy cows as they have a very sad life. Will be ordering this product again - not too sweet - perfect - thank you.
customer_reviews.author: susan jessie tehranchi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I changed from my other protein this and happy I did. It has great taste just with water..although I add other things to make it even healthier...overall very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of pea protein powders and I really like this one. I don't drink it everyday, only if I know I may not eat for awhile. Most protein powders, even the vegan ones, have upset my stomach and I have not had any problems with this one. I like the added greens as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Raw Organic Protein & Greens Chocolate - 20 Servings, Vegan Protein Powder for Women and Men, Juiced Greens and 20g Plant Protein plus Probiotics & Enzymes, Gluten-Free Low Carb Shake
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chocolate| Size:21.51 Ounce (Pack of 1)A delicious addition to the Garden of Life protein family, RAW Protein and greens is a Certified USDA Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified combination of clean organic plant protein and organic veggies.
feature_bullets: HIGH PROTEIN: 20 grams of raw organic plant protein from Organic Peas and Sprouted Organic Grains, Seeds and Legumes plus 6 organic greens and veggies
POST WORKOUT RECOVERY: Help your muscles recover with a clean nutritional shake powered by Organic non-GMO whole food protein and nutrient-rich green energy
GREEN SUPERFOOD DRINK: This delicious Chocolate protein powder is power-packed with green energy from raw, Organic veggie and green juices including Spinach, Kale, Broccoli & Alfalfa Grass
PROTEIN POWDER WITH PROBIOTICS: Tasty, smooth low carb protein shake with 1.5 Billion CFU probiotics and 13 non-GMO enzymes for easy digestion
VEGAN PROTEIN POWDER: USDA Organic, NSF Certified Gluten Free, Certified Vegan, Kosher and Informed Choice Trusted by Sport—delicious with water or unsweetened almond milk

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
